LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaStorage_Desc: The maximum amount of mana that can be held.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaGenerate_Desc: The max amount of mana produced daily. Mana production varies depending on specific conditions. \nMana that cannot be stored or exceeds the storage limit is converted into environmental mana, which slowly spreads through the surrounding land from the plant's current location and can be absorbed by other arcane plants.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaConsume_Desc: The max amount of mana consumed daily. Mana consumption varies depending on specific conditions. \nIf the consumption exceeds production and there is no stored mana, the arcane plant will not function.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaAbsorb_Desc: The amount of environment mana that can be absorbed daily. If it lacks mana or is able to store more, it absorbs environmental mana for consumption.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaPerShootDesc: The amount of mana consumed each time the weapon fires
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_AdjacentPlan: {0} mana from each adjacent arcane plants\{0} mana from each adjacent plant propotional to its growth
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_AdjacentWate: {0} mana if placed on water\n{1} mana from each adjacent water
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_BatteryStore: {0} mana propotional to the charged rate
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_WeatherRainy: {0} mana if rains and no roofed
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_WeatherSnowy: {0} mana if snowy and no roofed
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_Wind_Desc: {0} mana propotional to the wind speed
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_Fertility_De: {0} mana propotional to the fertility (Applies up to a maximum fertility of 140%, pot is treated as having 90% fertility)
